comments: Bring back the Craw! He was the easiest thing to pass. You didn\'t have to go to class, do any work, or even bother to listen to his jock stories to get an A. It was sweeeeeeeet!
Wants the students to learn more about life lessons that Econ. However, is very passionate about his students being successful. Would suggest if not an Econ major.
I\'m not sure he knows if he\'s teaching college students or if he\'s teaching elementary ed.
Amazing professor. Very helpful and understanding. We never used our book and he usually gave us a review of what was on the test the day before. Very good looking =)

Very fun class. Loved going to it. Would recommend it to anyone. Mr. Crawford is not like other teachers and he loves that. You dont use a book at all, he trys to make class interesting and succeeds. Not bad looking either!

Definitely a fun teacher and not bad to look at! He makes class fun-you never do the same thing twice. Uses videos and class activities a lot for teaching, and tells you what is going to be on tests. Very little writing assignments. Everything is easy to understand and he is willing to help. Prefers that students are always in class an on time
